elements.name: As a Po Curator, I can Edit Person record name information

steps.name: I know which Person record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I change the name of the Person I wish to edit
I set the Person status to either Pending or Active
I submit my edit request for Person
the system should change the Person name in the Person record to the new name

elements.name: As PO Curator, I can Edit a Person record phone number

steps.name: I know which Person record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I change the phone number of the Person I wish to edit
I submit my edit request for Person
the system should change the phone number in the Person record to the new phone number

elements.name: As a PO Curator, I can Edit a Person record email

steps.name: I know which Person record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I change the email of the Person I wish to edit
I submit my edit request for Person
the system should change the email address in the Person record to the new email address

elements.name: As a PO Curator, I can Edit a Person record Affiliated Organization effective and expiration dates

steps.name: I know which Person with affiliated Organization record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I select an Affiliated Organization
I change the effective date or expiration date of the Affiliated Organization I wish to edit
I submit my edit request for Person
the system should change the effective date or expiration date of the Affiliated Organization in the Person Record

elements.name: As a PO Curator, I can Edit a Person record and add an Affiliated Organization

steps.name: I know which Person with affiliated Organization record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I select the function to add an Affiliated Organization
I select an additional Affiliated organization
I enter the Affiliate organization effective date
I submit my edit request for Person
the system should add the Affiliated Organization with the effective date in the Person Record

elements.name: As a PO Curator, I can edit Person records with multiple parameters

steps.name: I know which Person with affiliated Organization record I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for a Person record and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Person
I am on the edit Person information screen
I change the Person Prefix
I change the Person First Name
I change the Person Middle Name
I change the Person Last Name
I change the Person Suffix
I change the Person Email
I change the Person Phone
I change an Affiliated Organization and Effective Date and Expiration Date
the system should update the Person record with the edited information
